Reviews.Title: “What can you say? Poor to Average Rating”

Reviews.Content: normal trick booked reading reviews reviews normal honest account staff polite helpful stayed 3 nights 24th 27th december christmas break goes stayed third floor bed ensuite firstly 51 steps nightmare steep narrow 10 feet 10 feet bathroom tiny shower toilet wash hand basin cold water bathroom couldnt reach basin straddling toilet clean clean serviced everyday clean sheets towels teacoffe facilities cups paper coca cola cup bed bugs mice sight stealing personal hear complaining reception police precaution locking suitcase reading reviews wait morning insulin injection wont believe six insulin pens medical bag luckily pen jacket pocket tie returned uk evening sum clean livable trouble stairs miss security thats nil accomodation seperate building key card enter building mean everybodys key doors heard dual card twin beds bunk bed location transport easy trams stay recommend stay price tempt cheap amsterdam definitely worth quality hassle stayed hotel stayed available read previous review breakfast ok 5 euros normal continental breakfast feel eating factory canteen probably doesnt merit horrendous reviews cleaning past advice choose else paid regards bob

Reviews.Title: “Get a grip people, it's not THAT bad!!!”
Reviews.Author: CharleneMoorhen
Reviews.Content: ive 3 night stay marnix hotel amsterdam pretty worried beforehand bad reviews id seen particularly pictures bedbugs booked paid hardly anyway didnt try change checkin ok guys desk bit unfriendly rude 2 flights stairs cant believe people moaned yes beds sheets clean trust checked alllllll guest fresh towel lucky near cleaners cupboard grab honest weekend youre youre sleeping yes plaster falling walls window frames repainting youre amsterdam look sit youre reason cheap clean central happy days

Reviews.Title: “Great cheap accomodation in good location with no rats or bedbugs!”
Reviews.Author: Oliver_GManchester
Reviews.Content: returned uk amsterdam stayed marnix 2 nights 25th 27 june booking beds 17 people 4 bedded ensuite 3 bedded ensuite 6 bedded cost person nights cheapest amsterdam guys read shocking reviews hostel involving bed bugs rats steep stairs poor facilities arrival completely suprised quality yes beds little squeezed expect price honest stag weekend amsterdam werent exactly sleeping anyway themselves clean sheets clean beds comfy fresh towels day bathroom facilities surprising extremely clean showers hot water briliant pressure crappy expecting communal toilet clean loo plenty youd surprised hostels stayed scarce hostel brilliant location bars opposite perfect meeting start night square 2min walk corner bars sport restaurants fast food outlets shops tram stops etc didnt facility walked distances main shopping street 2 min walk rembrandt square 10min walk red light district 20 min walk hostel extremely value money clean location recommend staying looking hostel
